body:
#### PR description:

Partial set of corrections in view of using V11 HGCal geometry

#### PR validation:

A private workflow is created to test this. That workflow will be committed once Kevin's changes to Phase2 scenario is merged

title: Phase2-hgx204 Make a few more bug corrections in view of new V11 geometry
